# rowlbot
[![R build status](https://github.com/inSileco/rowlbot/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/inSileco/rowlbot/actions)

An R Client for the [OWLBOT](https://owlbot.info/) API. 


# Installation 

```{R eval = FALSE}
remotes::install_github("inSileco/rowlbot")
```

```{R include = FALSE}
devtools::load_all()
```


# Example 

```{R}
library(rowlbot)
ex <- rowlbot("owl")
ex
```

So let's plot

```{R}
plot(ex)
```

# What for? 

No reason - just for fun.
